Loon-A-Tick

Amir Junaid Muhaddith Aka Loon's Trip to Malaysia

Podcast   /   Loon-A-Tick   /   #1 Loon @ Islamic University Malaysia

Amir Junaid Muhaddith Aka Loon

Amir Junaid Muhadith (born Chauncey Lamont Hawkins, June 20th 1975 in Harlem, New York) best known by his stage name Loon, was an American rapper formerly signed to P. Diddy's Bad Boy Records. He is best known for his role in P. Diddy's 2001 hits "I Need a Girl (Part One)" & "I Need a Girl (Part Two)".

#1 Loon @ Islamic University Malaysia

Loon's talk about his journey to Islam at Islamic University Malaysia.

Nov 04, 2017         34:29
